tool_description: This API helps to query for business news and live market data to create a financial site such as cnbc.com
name: CNBC
title: CNBC

api_list.name: symbols/translate
api_list.description: Get issueId from specific symbol

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description: Symbol of stock, index, exchange, etc...

api_list.name: symbols/get-peers
api_list.description: Get peers relating to stock quote, index, exchange, etc...

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description: The value of issueId field returned in .../auto-complete or .../symbols/translate endpoints.

api_list.name: symbols/get-priceline-chart
api_list.description: Generate image of price line chart of specific stock quote, index, exchange, etc...

required_parameters.name: issueId
required_parameters.description: The value of issueId field returned in .../auto-complete or .../symbols/translate endpoints.

optional_parameters.name: numberOfDays
optional_parameters.description: Number of days to generate image of price line chart (1 to 9999)

api_list.name: symbols/get-summary
api_list.description: Get summary information of stock quote, index, exchange, etc...

required_parameters.name: issueIds
required_parameters.description: The value of issueId field returned in .../auto-complete or .../symbols/translate endpoints. Separated by comma for multiple values. Ex : 36276,24812378

api_list.name: symbols/get-fundamentals
api_list.description: Get fundamental information of stock quote, index, exchange, etc...

required_parameters.name: issueIds
required_parameters.description: The value of issueId field returned in .../auto-complete or .../symbols/translate endpoints. Separated by comma for multiple values. Ex : 36276,24812378

api_list.name: symbols/get-earnings-chart
api_list.description: Generate image of earnings chart of specific stock quote, index, exchange, etc...

required_parameters.name: issueId
required_parameters.description: The value of issueId field returned in .../auto-complete or .../symbols/translate endpoints.

optional_parameters.name: numberOfYears
optional_parameters.description: Number of most latest years to get report of earnings (1 to 10)

api_list.name: symbols/v2/get-chart
api_list.description: Get raw data to draw price line chart of stock quote, index, exchange, etc...

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description: The value of 'symbolName' returned in .../auto-complete OR 'symbol' returned in .../v2/auto-complete endpoint.

optional_parameters.name: interval
optional_parameters.description: One of the following is allowed 1D|5D|1M|6M|YTD|1Y|5Y|ALL

api_list.name: news/v2/list-by-symbol
api_list.description: List latest news by symbol name

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description: The symbol returned in .../v2/auto-complete or other endpoints

api_list.name: news/v2/list
api_list.description: List news by category

required_parameters.name: franchiseId
required_parameters.description: The value of .../sectionData/parameters/franchiseId json object returned in .../get-meta-data endpoint. Pass this parameter multiple times for news from multiple categories. Ex : ...&franchiseId=105230142&franchiseId=15839263&...

optional_parameters.name: count
optional_parameters.description: The number of items returned by the endpoint

api_list.name: news/v2/list-special-reports
api_list.description: List special reports

api_list.name: news/v2/list-trending
api_list.description: List trending news

optional_parameters.name: count
optional_parameters.description: Number of items returned by the endpoint

api_list.name: symbols/get-profile
api_list.description: Get summary information of stock quote, index, exchange, etc...

required_parameters.name: issueId
required_parameters.description: The value of issueId field returned in .../auto-complete or .../symbols/translate endpoints.

api_list.name: symbols/get-chart (Deprecating)
api_list.description: Get raw data to draw price line chart of stock quote, index, exchange, etc...

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description: The value of issueId field returned in .../auto-complete or .../symbols/translate endpoints

optional_parameters.name: interval
optional_parameters.description: One of the following is allowed 1d|5d|1m|3m|6m|ytd|1y|3y|5y|10y|all

api_list.name: v2/auto-complete
api_list.description: Get auto suggestion by familiar terms or phrase

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.description: Any word or phrase that you are familiar with

api_list.name: get-meta-data
api_list.description: Get meta data that supports for other endpoints
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cnbc.p.rapidapi.com/get-meta-data"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cnbc.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cnbc.p.rapidapi.com/get-meta-data"

print(response.json())

api_list.name: auto-complete (Deprecated)
api_list.description: Get auto suggestion by familiar words or phrase

required_parameters.name: prefix
required_parameters.description: Any word or phrase that you are familiar with

api_list.name: news/list (Deprecated)
api_list.description: List news by category

required_parameters.name: franchiseId
required_parameters.description: The value of .../sectionData/parameters/franchiseId json object returned in .../get-meta-data endpoint

required_parameters.name: tickersymbol
required_parameters.description: The value of symbolName field returned in .../auto-complete endpoint

api_list.name: market/list-indices
api_list.description: List all available indices
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cnbc.p.rapidapi.com/market/list-indices"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cnbc.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
